articles.title: Warner & Marsh inspire Australia to win over Pakistan
articles.description: Watch highlights as centuries from Australia openers David Warner & Mitchell Marsh inspire Australia to a 62-run win over Pakistan in Bangalore in the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup.

articles.title: Why do crowds look so low at Cricket World Cup?
articles.description: BBC Sport analyses why so many matches at the Cricket World Cup have been poorly attended so far.
articles.content:
Empty stands have been a feature of Cricket World Cup games in India which don't feature the hosts
Two weeks in and, on the pitch, the Cricket World Cup in India is bubbling away nicely.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
